text: Maa goe ga hagalongo mai gi di Au i do manawa hagatau, gei e manawa i agu haganoho, mo di hai nia mee ala e hiihai ginai Au i dau hagalongo gi agu haganoho mo agu helekai, be di hai o dagu hege go David, gei Au ga madalia goe i nia madagoaa huogodoo. Au gaa hai goe gii hai di king o Israel mo di hai do hagadili gii dagi i oo muli, e hai be dagu hai ne hai gi David.
